TopicTitle: Zoom into navball for unmanned craft?

Articles.Content:
Apparently you can zoom into the navball in a manned craft by activating IVA. My craft is unmanned (ejection of asteroid from solar orbit) but I also need to precisely align my craft to the centre of mass of an asteroid so I need to zoom into the navball. Is that possible?

Edited January 10, 2015 by THX1138

Enhanced NavBall has scaling and sliding so you can zoom and you can also move it out of the way.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50524-0-90-Enhanced-Navball-1-3

Edited January 9, 2015 by Alshain

It doesn't zoom in on the navball, but there is a mod called NavHud which projects your navball on the sky, and it allows for much more precision than the standard navball. It's set up to toggle on and off with the "Y" key.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81543-0-90-NavHud-a-NavBall-inspired-Heads-Up-Display-1-1-4
